relation: There is the movie theater and the mall. Bowling is always fun.
There are some choices for different foods but mostly hamburgers and frie.
There are no dorms so that's a plus.
Add long as you pay attention and do your work you will do just fine.
Take your classes seriously. Do not be disrespectful it's a waste of everyones time. Use the help the school provides to you.
It is a clean school. They have very user friendly help for the students. All of the teaches i have had have been very understanding and nice to the students.

textAfterTable: Victoria from Clovis, NM 09/09/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 13 Categories Comments Bang for the buck I have financial aid so I do not pay for anything. Which helps ALOT for being a single parent. Am learning a lot I am in the Nursing Program and it is a great program to get your RN and a very high pass rate for the NCLEX! It does take a lot of your time, but is well worth it.
